channel.title: Mi Note 10 Lite MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater

image.title: Mi Note 10 Lite MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater

item.title: MIUI V12.0.2.0.QFNTRXM Fastboot update for Mi Note 10 Lite Turkey
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Mi Note 10 Lite Turkey

Codename: toco

Version: V12.0.2.0.QFNTRXM | 10.0

Size: 3.7 GB

MD5: ce51f7f04b509d589aa5147fc3e33e0b

Changelog:
[Control center]
New: Tapping a blank spot in Control center closes it now
Optimization: Control center layout in landscape mode
[System]
Updated Android Security Patch to October 2020. Increased system security.

Download: Here
